Date: March 1, 2024 | Time: 2:00 pm ET/11:00 am PT

Have you ever wanted to make videos for your firm, but have no idea where to start? In this webinar, we’re taking the intimidation out of video for law firms. Join us as guest speaker Robert Weiss walks you through how to develop a video strategy, how to create videos specific to your firm’s needs, and how to use those videos effectively.

Law Firm Video 101: Establishing Trust With an Effective Video Strategy begins promptly at 2 p.m. ET/11 a.m. PT on Friday, March 1, 2024.
